channel.title: pfsense on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in pfsense on devopstales

item.title: MikroTik - RouterOS: PPPOE Server
item.description: In this post I will show you how to configure a PPPOE Server on on MikroTik RouterOS router.

item.title: AWS - pfsense: Site-to-site VPN using static routes
item.description: In this post I willll show you how to configure a VPN between pfSense and AWS using static routes.

item.title: Firewall Ports for AD Domain Join
item.description: In this post I will show you what port you need to enable for AD Domain Join.

item.title: HA IPSec VPN with BGP Dynamic Routing between two pfSense Appliances
item.description: In this post I will setup an IPSec dynamic route-based vpn tunnel between two pfSense Appliances.

item.title: Analyzing PFsense logs in Graylog4
item.description: We will parse the log records generated by the PfSense Firewall. We already have our graylog server running and we will start preparing the terrain to capture those logs records.

item.title: Install Graylog4
item.description: Graylog is defined in terms of log management platform for collecting, indexing, and analyzing both structured and unstructured data from almost any source.

item.title: Analyzing PFsense squid logs in Graylog
item.description: We will parse the access log records generated by the PfSense’s squd plugin. We already have our graylog server running and we will start preparing the terrain to capture those logs records.

item.title: Analyzing PFsense logs in Graylog3
item.description: We will parse the log records generated by the PfSense Firewall. We already have our graylog server running and we will start preparing the terrain to capture those logs records.

item.title: Install Graylog3
item.description: Graylog is defined in terms of log management platform for collecting, indexing, and analyzing both structured and unstructured data from almost any source.

item.title: Configurate ipmitool
item.description: The Intelligent Platform Management Interface (IPMI) is a set of computer interface specifications for an autonomous computer subsystem that provides management and monitoring capabilities independently of the host system’s CPU, firmware (BIOS or UEFI) and operating system.

item.title: Google Authenticator on pfSense
item.description: This article explains how to set up OpenVPN with Google Authenticator on pfSense.

item.title: Pfsese USG S2S VPN
item.description: I will show you how to create a site-to-site VPN for pfSense and unifi usg.

item.title: Install telegraf on pfsense
item.description: Install and configure telegraf on pfsense to provides system information to prometheus.
